summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of Lots 1 to 5, inclusive, Block 1, and Lots 1 to 10, inclusive, Block 3, Hebb's Avion City Addition, with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto two new sections to be numbered 2-48 and 17-30, respectively.
